headline: Comcast Comcast Corporation (CMCSA) and Local Media Association (LMA) Launches Economic Opportunity Lab
summary: With a one-year share price decline and significant hedge fund interest, Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) secures a spot on our list of the 12 Best Stocks to Buy in Falling Markets According to Hedge Funds. On August 20, 2025, Comcast NBCUniversal and the Local Media Association (LMA) introduced the 2025-2026 Economic Opportunity Lab, a historic effort […]
